original: @262b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @262b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya kharsa p'a ni lo ka n'a tha s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya kharsa p'a ni lo ka n'a tha s'a dha nam /
translated: Ārya-kārṣapaṇy-lokanātha-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa kharsa p'a ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags pa kharsa p'a ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: 'phags pa khar sa pa ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs

original: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Lokanātha.

original: gnas dben par bde ba'i stan la sngags pa 'dug ste /
analyzed: gnas dben par bde ba'i stan la sngags pa 'dug ste /
translated: The mantra practitioner sits on a comfortable seat in an isolated place.

original: dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom mo //
analyzed: dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom mo //
translated: First, one should cultivate the four abodes of Brahmā.

original: de nas snying gar aa las zla bar hr'i:dkar po bsams pa'i 'od 'phros pas /
analyzed: de nas snying gar aa las zla bar hr'i:dkar po bsams pa'i 'od 'phros pas /
translated: Then, one imagines a white hrīḥ syllable arising from an a syllable on a moon at the heart, and light radiates from it.

original: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize the guru, buddhas, and bodhisattvas in the space in front.

original: yang de'i 'od las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: yang de'i 'od las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
translated: Again, one should make offerings with the cloud of offerings that arise from that light, and so forth, as before.

original: de'i 'og tu aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod pas bdag nyid stong par bsgom mo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod pas bdag nyid stong par bsgom mo //
translated: After that, by reciting oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho 'haṃ, one should meditate on oneself as empty.

original: de nas sna tshogs padma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du hr'i:gsal ba'i 'od 'phros pas /
analyzed: de nas sna tshogs padma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du hr'i:gsal ba'i 'od 'phros pas /
translated: Light radiates from that

original: 'gro ba rigs lnga'i sdug bsngal thams cad sbyangs nas /
analyzed: 'gro ba rigs lnga'i sdug bsngal thams cad sbyangs nas /
translated: and purifies all the sufferings of the five classes of migrating beings.

original: slar de nyid du 'dus pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur par bsam mo //
analyzed: slar de nyid du 'dus pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur par bsam mo //
translated: Again, it gathers back into that and becomes oneself as Lokeśvara.

original: de yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po skyed skyil gyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: de yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po skyed skyil gyis bzhugs pa /
translated: He has one face, two arms, and is white in color, sitting in vajra position.

original: dbu skra'i cod pan can dang / snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: dbu skra'i cod pan can dang / snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
translated: He has a hair topknot and is crowned with Amitābha.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol pa /
analyzed: mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol pa /
translated: He is dressed in beautiful garments.

original: phyag g-yas pus mo la brten te brkyang pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pus mo la brten te brkyang pa /
translated: His right hand is extended, resting on his knee.🔽His left hand holds a lotus.

original: g-yon pa padma bsnams par bsgoms la dpral bar zla ba /
analyzed: g-yon pa padma bsnams par bsgoms la dpral bar zla ba /
translated: Visualize a moon on his forehead,

original: mgrin par aom /
analyzed: mgrin par aom /
translated: an oṃ on his throat,

original: snying gar a'a:h'um rnams gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: snying gar a'a:h'um rnams gsal bar bya'o //
translated: and an āḥ and hūṃ on his heart.

original: de'i g-yas ngos su lha mo sgrol ma gzhon nu'i tshul can dang / g-yon na khro gnyer can dang khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsam mo //🔽de ltar @263a * //
analyzed: de'i g-yas ngos su lha mo sgrol ma gzhon nu'i tshul can dang / g-yon na khro gnyer can dang khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsam mo // de ltar @263a * //
translated: To the right of him, one should imagine the youthful Tārā, and to the left, Bhṛkuṭī and the wrathful Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: bsam gtan byas pa'i 'og tu bzlas pa ni aom hr'i:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bsam gtan byas pa'i 'og tu bzlas pa ni aom hr'i:sv'a h'a /
translated: After having done the meditation in this way, the recitation is: Oṃ hrīḥ svāhā.

original: 'phags pa kharsa p'a ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags pa kharsa p'a ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Noble Kṣetrapāla Lokanātha is complete.
